42 namespace TiledArray {
43 namespace detail {
44 // these convert any range into TiledArray::Range
45 
46 inline const TiledArray::Range& make_ta_range(const TiledArray::Range& range) {
47  return range;
48 }
49 
51 
54 template <CBLAS_ORDER Order, typename... Args>
55 inline TiledArray::Range make_ta_range(
56  const btas::RangeNd<Order, Args...>& range) {
57  TA_USER_ASSERT(Order == CblasRowMajor,
58  "TiledArray::detail::make_ta_range(btas::RangeNd<Order,...>): "
59  "not supported for col-major Order");
60  return TiledArray::Range(range.lobound(), range.upbound());
61 }
62 
63 } // namespace detail
64 } // namespace TiledArray

66 namespace btas {

74 template <CBLAS_ORDER Order, typename... Args>
75 inline bool is_congruent(const btas::RangeNd<Order, Args...>& r1,
76  const btas::RangeNd<Order, Args...>& r2) {
77  return (r1.rank() == r2.rank()) &&
78  std::equal(r1.extent_data(), r1.extent_data() + r1.rank(),
79  r2.extent_data());
80 }
81 
82 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
83 decltype(auto) make_ti(const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
84  return TiledArray::detail::TensorInterface<const T, Range,
85  btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>>(
86  arg.range(), arg.data());
87 }
88 
89 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
90 decltype(auto) make_ti(btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
91  return TiledArray::detail::TensorInterface<T, Range,
92  btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>>(
93  arg.range(), arg.data());
94 }
95 
96 template <typename... Args>
97 inline bool operator==(const TiledArray::Range& range1,
98  const btas::BaseRangeNd<Args...>& range2) {
99  const auto rank = range1.rank();
100  if (rank == range2.rank()) {
101  auto range1_lobound_data = range1.lobound_data();
102  using std::cbegin;
103  const auto lobound_match =
104  std::equal(range1_lobound_data, range1_lobound_data + rank,
105  cbegin(range2.lobound()));
106  if (lobound_match) {
107  auto range1_upbound_data = range1.upbound_data();
108  return std::equal(range1_upbound_data, range1_upbound_data + rank,
109  cbegin(range2.upbound()));
110  }
111  }
112  return false;
113 }
114 
116 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
117 inline btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage> clone(
118  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
119  return arg;
120 }

123 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
124 inline btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage> permute(
125  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg,
126  const TiledArray::Permutation& perm) {
127  // btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage> result;
128  // std::vector<size_t> p(perm.dim());
129  // std::copy(perm.begin(), perm.end(), p.begin());
130  // btas::permute(arg, p, result);
131  // return result;
132  auto arg_view = make_ti(arg);
133  return arg_view.permute(perm);
134 }

143 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage, typename Index>
144 inline btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage> shift(
145  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg, const Index& range_shift) {
146  auto shifted_arg = clone(arg);
147  shift_to(shifted_arg, range_shift);
148  return shifted_arg;
149 }
150 
152 
156 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage, typename Index>
157 inline btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& shift_to(
158  btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg, const Index& range_shift) {
159  const_cast<Range&>(arg.range()).inplace_shift(range_shift);
160  return arg;
161 }

164 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
165 inline btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage> add(
166  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg1,
167  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg2) {
168  auto arg1_view = make_ti(arg1);
169  auto arg2_view = make_ti(arg2);
170  return arg1_view.add(arg2_view);
171 }

178  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg1,
179  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg2, const Scalar factor) {
180  auto arg1_view = make_ti(arg1);
181  auto arg2_view = make_ti(arg2);
182  return arg1_view.add(arg2_view, factor);
183 }

469 
470 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage, typename Scalar>
471 inline btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage> gemm(
472  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& left,
473  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& right, Scalar factor,
474  const TiledArray::math::GemmHelper& gemm_helper) {
475  // Check that the arguments are not empty and have the correct ranks
476  TA_ASSERT(!left.empty());
477  TA_ASSERT(left.range().rank() == gemm_helper.left_rank());
478  TA_ASSERT(!right.empty());
479  TA_ASSERT(right.range().rank() == gemm_helper.right_rank());
480 
481  // Construct the result Tensor
482  typedef btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage> Tensor;
483  Tensor result(
484  gemm_helper.make_result_range<Range>(left.range(), right.range()));
485 
486  // Check that the inner dimensions of left and right match
487  TA_ASSERT(
488  TiledArray::ignore_tile_position() ||
489  gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(std::cbegin(left.range().lobound()),
490  std::cbegin(right.range().lobound())));
491  TA_ASSERT(
492  TiledArray::ignore_tile_position() ||
493  gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(std::cbegin(left.range().upbound()),
494  std::cbegin(right.range().upbound())));
495  TA_ASSERT(gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(
496  std::cbegin(left.range().extent()), std::cbegin(right.range().extent())));
497 
498  // Compute gemm dimensions
499  integer m = 1, n = 1, k = 1;
500  gemm_helper.compute_matrix_sizes(m, n, k, left.range(), right.range());
501 
502  // Get the leading dimension for left and right matrices.
503  const integer lda =
504  (gemm_helper.left_op() == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? k : m);
505  const integer ldb =
506  (gemm_helper.right_op() == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? n : k);
507 
508  T factor_t(factor);
509 
510  TiledArray::math::gemm(gemm_helper.left_op(), gemm_helper.right_op(), m, n, k,
511  factor_t, left.data(), lda, right.data(), ldb, T(0),
512  result.data(), n);
513 
514  return result;
515 }
516 
517 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage, typename Scalar>
518 inline void gemm(btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& result,
519  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& left,
520  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& right, Scalar factor,
521  const TiledArray::math::GemmHelper& gemm_helper) {
522  // Check that this tensor is not empty and has the correct rank
523  TA_ASSERT(!result.empty());
524  TA_ASSERT(result.range().rank() == gemm_helper.result_rank());
525 
526  // Check that the arguments are not empty and have the correct ranks
527  TA_ASSERT(!left.empty());
528  TA_ASSERT(left.range().rank() == gemm_helper.left_rank());
529  TA_ASSERT(!right.empty());
530  TA_ASSERT(right.range().rank() == gemm_helper.right_rank());
531 
532  // Check that the outer dimensions of left match the the corresponding
533  // dimensions in result
534  TA_ASSERT(
535  TiledArray::ignore_tile_position() ||
536  gemm_helper.left_result_congruent(std::cbegin(left.range().lobound()),
537  std::cbegin(result.range().lobound())));
538  TA_ASSERT(
539  TiledArray::ignore_tile_position() ||
540  gemm_helper.left_result_congruent(std::cbegin(left.range().upbound()),
541  std::cbegin(result.range().upbound())));
542  TA_ASSERT(
543  gemm_helper.left_result_congruent(std::cbegin(left.range().extent()),
544  std::cbegin(result.range().extent())));
545 
546  // Check that the outer dimensions of right match the the corresponding
547  // dimensions in result
548  TA_ASSERT(TiledArray::ignore_tile_position() ||
549  gemm_helper.right_result_congruent(
550  std::cbegin(right.range().lobound()),
551  std::cbegin(result.range().lobound())));
552  TA_ASSERT(TiledArray::ignore_tile_position() ||
553  gemm_helper.right_result_congruent(
554  std::cbegin(right.range().upbound()),
555  std::cbegin(result.range().upbound())));
556  TA_ASSERT(
557  gemm_helper.right_result_congruent(std::cbegin(right.range().extent()),
558  std::cbegin(result.range().extent())));
559 
560  // Check that the inner dimensions of left and right match
561  TA_ASSERT(
562  TiledArray::ignore_tile_position() ||
563  gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(std::cbegin(left.range().lobound()),
564  std::cbegin(right.range().lobound())));
565  TA_ASSERT(
566  TiledArray::ignore_tile_position() ||
567  gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(std::cbegin(left.range().upbound()),
568  std::cbegin(right.range().upbound())));
569  TA_ASSERT(gemm_helper.left_right_congruent(
570  std::cbegin(left.range().extent()), std::cbegin(right.range().extent())));
571 
572  // Compute gemm dimensions
573  integer m, n, k;
574  gemm_helper.compute_matrix_sizes(m, n, k, left.range(), right.range());
575 
576  // Get the leading dimension for left and right matrices.
577  const integer lda =
578  (gemm_helper.left_op() == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? k : m);
579  const integer ldb =
580  (gemm_helper.right_op() == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? n : k);
581 
582  T factor_t(factor);
583 
584  TiledArray::math::gemm(gemm_helper.left_op(), gemm_helper.right_op(), m, n, k,
585  factor_t, left.data(), lda, right.data(), ldb, T(1),
586  result.data(), n);
587 }
588 
589 // sum of the hyperdiagonal elements
590 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
591 inline typename btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>::value_type trace(
592  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
593  assert(false);
594 }
595 // foreach(i) result += arg[i]
596 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
597 inline decltype(auto) sum(const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
598  return make_ti(arg).sum();
599 }
600 // foreach(i) result *= arg[i]
601 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
602 inline decltype(auto) product(const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
603  return make_ti(arg).product();
604 }
605 
606 // foreach(i) result += arg[i] * arg[i]
607 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
608 inline decltype(auto) squared_norm(const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
609  return make_ti(arg).squared_norm();
610 };
611 
612 // foreach(i) result += arg1[i] * arg2[i]
613 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
614 inline decltype(auto) dot(const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg1,
615  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg2) {
616  return make_ti(arg1).dot(make_ti(arg2));
617 };
618 
619 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
620 inline decltype(auto) inner_product(
621  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg1,
622  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg2) {
623  return make_ti(arg1).inner_product(make_ti(arg2));
624 };
625 
626 // sqrt(squared_norm(arg))
627 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
628 inline decltype(auto) norm(const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
629  return make_ti(arg).norm();
630 }
631 // sqrt(squared_norm(arg))
632 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage, typename ResultType>
633 inline void norm(const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg,
634  ResultType& result) {
635  result = make_ti(arg).template norm<ResultType>();
636 }
637 // foreach(i) result = max(result, arg[i])
638 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
639 inline decltype(auto) max(const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
640  return make_ti(arg).max();
641 }
642 // foreach(i) result = min(result, arg[i])
643 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
644 inline decltype(auto) min(const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
645  return make_ti(arg).min();
646 }
647 // foreach(i) result = max(result, abs(arg[i]))
648 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
649 inline decltype(auto) abs_max(const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
650  return make_ti(arg).abs_max();
651 }
652 // foreach(i) result = max(result, abs(arg[i]))
653 template <typename T, typename Range, typename Storage>
654 inline typename btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>::value_type abs_min(
655  const btas::Tensor<T, Range, Storage>& arg) {
656  return make_ti(arg).abs_min();
657 }
658 } // namespace btas
659 
660 namespace TiledArray {
665 template <typename Perm>
666 typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<Perm, TiledArray::Permutation>::value,
667  TiledArray::Range>::type
668 permute(const TiledArray::Range& r, const Perm& p) {
669  TiledArray::Permutation pp(p.begin(), p.end());
670  return pp * r;
671 }
672 
673 } // namespace TiledArray
674 
675 namespace TiledArray {
676 namespace detail {
677 
678 template <typename T, typename... Args>
679 struct is_tensor_helper<btas::Tensor<T, Args...>> : public std::true_type {};
680 
681 template <typename T, typename... Args>
682 struct is_contiguous_tensor_helper<btas::Tensor<T, Args...>>
683  : public std::true_type {};
684 
685 } // namespace detail
686 } // namespace TiledArray
687 
688 namespace TiledArray {
690 template <typename T, typename Allocator, typename Range_, typename Storage>
691 struct Cast<TiledArray::Tensor<T, Allocator>,
692  btas::Tensor<T, Range_, Storage>> {
693  auto operator()(const btas::Tensor<T, Range_, Storage>& arg) const {
694  TiledArray::Tensor<T, Allocator> result(detail::make_ta_range(arg.range()));
695  using std::begin;
696  std::copy(btas::cbegin(arg), btas::cend(arg), begin(result));
697  return result;
698  }
699 };
700 } // namespace TiledArray
701 
702 namespace madness {
703 namespace archive {
704 
705 #ifdef BTAS_HAS_BOOST_CONTAINER
706 template <class Archive, typename T, std::size_t N, typename A>
707 struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, boost::container::small_vector<T, N, A>> {
708  static inline void load(const Archive& ar,
709  boost::container::small_vector<T, N, A>& x) {
710  std::size_t n{};
711  ar& n;
712  x.resize(n);
713  for (auto& xi : x) ar& xi;
714  }
715 };
716 
717 template <class Archive, typename T, std::size_t N, typename A>
718 struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, boost::container::small_vector<T, N, A>> {
719  static inline void store(const Archive& ar,
720  const boost::container::small_vector<T, N, A>& x) {
721  ar& x.size();
722  for (const auto& xi : x) ar& xi;
723  }
724 };
725 #endif
726 
727 template <class Archive, typename T>
728 struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, btas::varray<T>> {
729  static inline void load(const Archive& ar, btas::varray<T>& x) {
730  typename btas::varray<T>::size_type n{};
731  ar& n;
732  x.resize(n);
733  for (typename btas::varray<T>::value_type& xi : x) ar& xi;
734  }
735 };
736 
737 template <class Archive, typename T>
738 struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, btas::varray<T>> {
739  static inline void store(const Archive& ar, const btas::varray<T>& x) {
740  ar& x.size();
741  for (const typename btas::varray<T>::value_type& xi : x) ar& xi;
742  }
743 };
744 
745 template <class Archive, CBLAS_ORDER _Order, typename _Index>
746 struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, btas::BoxOrdinal<_Order, _Index>> {
747  static inline void load(const Archive& ar,
748  btas::BoxOrdinal<_Order, _Index>& o) {
749  typename btas::BoxOrdinal<_Order, _Index>::stride_type stride{};
750  typename btas::BoxOrdinal<_Order, _Index>::value_type offset{};
751  bool cont{};
752  ar& stride& offset& cont;
753  o = btas::BoxOrdinal<_Order, _Index>(std::move(stride), std::move(offset),
754  std::move(cont));
755  }
756 };
757 
758 template <class Archive, CBLAS_ORDER _Order, typename _Index>
759 struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, btas::BoxOrdinal<_Order, _Index>> {
760  static inline void store(const Archive& ar,
761  const btas::BoxOrdinal<_Order, _Index>& o) {
762  ar& o.stride() & o.offset() & o.contiguous();
763  }
764 };
765 
766 template <class Archive, CBLAS_ORDER _Order, typename _Index, typename _Ordinal>
767 struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, btas::RangeNd<_Order, _Index, _Ordinal>> {
768  static inline void load(const Archive& ar,
769  btas::RangeNd<_Order, _Index, _Ordinal>& r) {
770  typedef typename btas::BaseRangeNd<
771  btas::RangeNd<_Order, _Index, _Ordinal>>::index_type index_type;
772  index_type lobound{}, upbound{};
773  _Ordinal ordinal{};
774  ar& lobound& upbound& ordinal;
775  r = btas::RangeNd<_Order, _Index, _Ordinal>(
776  std::move(lobound), std::move(upbound), std::move(ordinal));
777  }
778 };
779 
780 template <class Archive, CBLAS_ORDER _Order, typename _Index, typename _Ordinal>
781 struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, btas::RangeNd<_Order, _Index, _Ordinal>> {
782  static inline void store(const Archive& ar,
783  const btas::RangeNd<_Order, _Index, _Ordinal>& r) {
784  ar& r.lobound() & r.upbound() & r.ordinal();
785  }
786 };
787 
788 template <class Archive, typename _T, class _Range, class _Store>
789 struct ArchiveLoadImpl<Archive, btas::Tensor<_T, _Range, _Store>> {
790  static inline void load(const Archive& ar,
791  btas::Tensor<_T, _Range, _Store>& t) {
792  _Range range{};
793  _Store store{};
794  ar& range& store;
795  t = btas::Tensor<_T, _Range, _Store>(std::move(range), std::move(store));
796  }
797 };
798 
799 template <class Archive, typename _T, class _Range, class _Store>
800 struct ArchiveStoreImpl<Archive, btas::Tensor<_T, _Range, _Store>> {
801  static inline void store(const Archive& ar,
802  const btas::Tensor<_T, _Range, _Store>& t) {
803  ar& t.range() & t.storage();
804  }
805 };
806 } // namespace archive
807 } // namespace madness
808 
809 #endif /* TILEDARRAY_EXTERNAL_BTAS_H__INCLUDED */
